author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENZO STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENZO STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 14.8, -41.2 with movement NW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENZO STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 14.8, -41.2 with movement NW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
